content.raw:
Apologies for the delay.  Sorry you are having trouble with the deb install.

Could you post the output from the following commands…

```
lsb_release -a
rosversion -d
gazebo -v
rosls wave_gazebo 
rosls wave_gazebo/world_models/ocean_waves/
```

We should expect something consistent with…

```
developer@a5dae6f8b55e:~$ lsb_release -a
No LSB modules are available.
Distributor ID:	Ubuntu
Description:	Ubuntu 18.04.1 LTS
Release:	18.04
Codename:	bionic
developer@a5dae6f8b55e:~$ rosversion -d
melodic
developer@a5dae6f8b55e:~$ gazebo -v
Gazebo multi-robot simulator, version 9.6.0
Copyright (C) 2012 Open Source Robotics Foundation.
Released under the Apache 2 License.
http://gazebosim.org


Gazebo multi-robot simulator, version 9.6.0
Copyright (C) 2012 Open Source Robotics Foundation.
Released under the Apache 2 License.
http://gazebosim.org


developer@a5dae6f8b55e:~$ rosls wave_gazebo 
CHANGELOG.rst  CMakeLists.txt  config  launch  package.xml  world_models  worlds
```

Could you post the output from the following commands…
